name: Below (itch) (WIM Games)
description:
Introduction

A zero budget game with an unusual situation and a lot of surprises. Sometimes things will not be as you expect. Make sure to find the right way to progress and beat the level (It will not be easy I promise). Use your intelligence, your skill, learn from mistakes and the most important, enjoy.

Controls

  • Move - Left/Right Arrows (alternative "A/D" keys)
  • Jump - Space
  • Pause - ESC
  • Restart - "R" key

You can configure controls input in the "Below Configuration" window

Features

  • Joystick support
  • Configurable controls
  • 3 graphics quality options (Fast, Good and Fantastic)
  • Optimized graphics for better performance
  • Resizable Window

Update

New level added. If you have already downloaded the first version, re-download the game to access the new level.
